block.p: Deborah Anne Berson, the daughter of Marianne C. Berson and Dr. Burton L. Berson, both of Manhattan, was married last evening to Stephen Blair Parnes, the son of Claire and Richard Parnes of Riverdale, the Bronx. Rabbi Harvey M. Tattelbaum officiated at the Rolling Hills Country Club in Wilton, Conn.

Mrs. Parnes, 28, is a senior consultant at Vintage Resources, an executive recruiting company in Manhattan. She graduated from the University of Rochester. Her father is an associate clinical professor of orthopedic surgery and the chief of sports medicine and arthroscopic surgery at Mount Sinai Medical Center in Manhattan. Her mother is a psychotherapist in private practice, also in Manhattan.

Deborah Anne Berson, the daughter of Marianne C. Berson and Dr. Burton L. Berson, both of Manhattan, was married last evening to Stephen Blair Parnes, the son of Claire and Richard Parnes of Riverdale, the Bronx. Rabbi Harvey M. Tattelbaum officiated at the Rolling Hills Country Club in Wilton, Conn.

Mrs. Parnes, 28, is a senior consultant at Vintage Resources, an executive recruiting company in Manhattan. She graduated from the University of Rochester. Her father is an associate clinical professor of orthopedic surgery and the chief of sports medicine and arthroscopic surgery at Mount Sinai Medical Center in Manhattan. Her mother is a psychotherapist in private practice, also in Manhattan.

Mr. Parnes, 34, is a co-owner of the DDP Construction Group, a real estate development and construction business in Manhattan. He graduated from Brandeis University and received a law degree from Yeshiva University. His mother is a social worker at the Jewish Home and Hospital in the Bronx. His father, who works in College Point, Queens, is a salesman in the home remodeling division of Century 21, the real estate brokerage company.
